encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

bibl.title: The Collected Biblical Writings of T.C. Skeat. Introduced and Edited by J.K. ELLIOTT. (Supplements to Novum Testamentum. 113.)
bibl.note: Reproduction de 23 articles (1938-2001). - Pp. vii: J.K.E., Preface; - ix-xxvi: J.K.E., Introduction [survey of Skeat's work on the New Testament]; - xxvii-xxxiv: Bibliography of T.C. Skeat's Publications; - 269-294: Appendixes (A. The Formation of the Four-Gospel Codex. A Dramatized Account of how it may have come about; - B. The Arrival of the Fifty Bibles in Constantinople; - C. J.K.E., T.C. Skeat on the Dating and Origin of Codex Vaticanus); - 295-299: Indexes.

bibl.author: Paul Foster
bibl.title: JThS N.S., 56
bibl.note: C.R. par Paul Foster, JThS N.S., 56 (2005) pp. 179-184.

bibl.author: Thomas J. Kraus
bibl.title: TC: A Journal of Biblical Textual Criticism 12
bibl.note: Thomas J. Kraus, TC: A Journal of Biblical Textual Criticism 12 (2007) < http://rosetta.reltech.org/TC/vol12/Skeat2007rev.pdf >.
